testcase.classname: WebAutomationTask - Order T-Shirt and Update personal info on sample website
testcase.name: User orders T-shirt
testcase.system-out: Given user logs into the automationpractice website.........................passed When user inputs the valid email and password...............................passed Then user enters the home automationpractice page...........................passed Given user lands on my order page...........................................passed When user selects a T-shirt.................................................passed And user proceeds to checkout by passing summary,address,shipping and payment screens.passed Then Now User Clicks the Confirm Button.....................................passed And order is successfully placed............................................passed And user logs out from store................................................passed

testcase.classname: WebAutomationTask - Order T-Shirt and Update personal info on sample website
testcase.name: User change/updates the personal info
testcase.system-out: Given user logs into the automationpractice website.........................passed When user inputs the valid email and password...............................passed Then user enters the home automationpractice page...........................passed Given user lands on personal information page...............................passed And user updates the last name value........................................passed When user save the changes..................................................passed Then value is successfully changed..........................................passed And user logs out from store................................................passed
